notes: On 3 August 2022, the Cameroonian military forces beat up civilians in Balikumbat (Balikumbat, Ngo-Ketunjia, Nord-Ouest) in their search for separatist fighters.
Looting: On 6 January 2021, the military forces raided Owe village, Muyuka subdivision (Fako, Sud-Ouest). They broke into houses and took away money.

On 13 August 2023, state security forces, coded as the military forces, shot and killed 1 Ambazonian Separatist and left his body along the Kumba - Mamfe road in Kurume (Konye, Meme, Sud-Ouest). They had arrested the Separatist over a year ago.

On 31 May 2024, the military forces severely beat a civilian at a checkpoint in Ashing (Belo, Boyo, Nord-Ouest) for an unknown reason. There were no fatalities. The civilian was traveling to sell flowers at graduation when he was stopped and taken to a nearby house by the soldiers. He was taken to the Kikwini hospital for treatment.

On 21 April 2024, gendarmerie officers clashed with Ambazonian Separatists from the Restoration Forces faction at the Separatist hideout in Kouki (Mbven, Bui, Nord-Ouest). There were no fatalities. No information on the injuries.
